text:
Waktu check-in aku dikasih tau sama mba di FO klu hotel ini connecting sama Gajahmada Plaza. Trs mba nya ngasih tau pintu connecting nya. Waktu check-in nya cepet banget padahal masih mau duduk2 di lobbynya yg luas. Ya udah deh aku dan teman ku lgsg masuk kamar aja. 

Kamarnya emang ga begitu luas tapi bersih, nyaman dan adem. Jadilah kami rebahan dulu sebelum beraktifitas lain. Cek ke kamar mandi bersih. Amenities lengkap dan handuknya wangi. Saking asyiknya ngobrol sampe lupa kalau belum makan siang. Mau makan di luar ternyata panas banget.

Jadilah kami maksi di resto hotelnya aja. Ternyata menunya beragam dan rasanya cocok di lidah. Aku suka dengan pelayanan restonya yg sabaaar banget nungguin kami milih2 menu dan tanya2.

Di samping resto ada tempat duduk2 buat ngopi. Trs di sebelahnya lagi ada poolnya juga. Wah...ini sih ga usah kemana2 klu mau nongkrong ngopi.

Aku nggak salah nginep di Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajahmada. Selain nyaman hotelnya  strategis. Pelayanannya ramah dan komunikasi nya bagus. Temen ku yang datang dari luar kota juga senang nginep di sini. Sampe waktu checkout masih berasa nyamannya dan bakal ke sini lagi deh.

text:
Staycation dengan lokasi yang samgat strategis di pusat kota Jakarta, hotel ini selain unggul dari fasilitas juga dari segi lokasi. 
  
Hanya berjarak 2KM sajah dari stasiun gambir, dan hanya kurang dari 5 km dari tempat hiburan Ancol Jakarta. 
 
Yang buat amazing lokasinya bersebelahan dengan pusat perbelanjaan Gajah Mada Plaza. 
 
Walaupun hotel budget, hotel ini juga dilengkapi dengan fasilitas kolam renang yang cozy banget. 
 
Untuk restonya ada area indoor dan outdoor, dan waktu yang tepat untuk bersantai di area outdoor resto yanitu di sore hari.  

 Karena area otdoor restonya bersebelahan dengan kolam renang, jadi paling cocok sore hari nongkrong sambil berenang. 
 
Untul makanannya sendri sangat rekomendasi sekali, jadi ini sangat cocok untuk staycation dengan keluarga ataupun tempat istirahat ketika sedang ada bisnis di daerah Gajah Mada Jakarta. 
 
Untul service nya ramah sekali, jadi tak heran saya ingin kembali lagi staycation di  Ibis Style Gajah Mada.
title: Good Service Ibis Style Gajah Mada

text:
Pertama kali saya mengunjungi Ibis Styles Gajah Mada adalah di tahun 2012 dan itu pada acara buka puasa bersama kantor lama saya serta nama propertinya masih All Seasons Gajah Mada juga pasa saat itu belum ada kolam renangnya. 

Namun pada Maret 2020, saya kembali mengunjungi properti luar biasa ini dan sudah berganti nama menjadi Ibis Styles Gajah Mada. Semuanya masih terlihat sama dengan tahun 2012, masih luarbiasa dan suasananya nyaman sekali, plus sudah ada kolam renangnya. 
Kamar yang saya dapat, sungguh indah pemandangannya dan bersih serta luas sekali. Membuat nyaman dan merasa berada dirumah. 

Hotel ini terasa sangat luar biasa karena pada saat itu saya dibantu oleh ka Annisa di Front Desk, seorang talents Ibis Styles yang sangat ramah dan solutif, Sangat beruntung Ibis Styles Gajah Mada memiliki talents front desk yang luar biasa. 

Overall hotel ini nyaman sekali, lokasi nya strategis, punya akses langsung ke Gajah Mada Plaza, kolam renangnya bersih dan talentsnya luat biasa semua. 

Terima kasih

text:
Menginap di Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada bersama keluarga (saya, istri, dan 2 anak remaja kami) pada hari ke-2 lebaran kemarin sangat menyenangkan, dimulai saat check in pelayanan di hotel ini ramah dan cepat, karena kami memesan 2 kamar maka ditawari connecting room dimana kamar saya dan istri terhubung dengan kamar anak-anak kami.
Saat memasuki kamar anak-anak kami sangat senang karena kamarnya cukup luas dengan view kolam renang.
Kamar yang kami tempati memang cukup besar dan bersih, perlengkapan kamar mandi juga tersedia cukup lengkap, dan semua berfungsi dengan baik.
Saat sarapan kami pun tak menemui kekurangan apapun, makanan cukup banyak variasi dengan cita rasa yang sangat cocok di lidah.
Dan pada saat check out ini melengkapi kepuasan kami pada hotel ini, pelayanannya pun cepat dan ramah.
Jika menginap kembali di Jakarta maka hotel ini sangat layak untuk dikunjungi kembali.

text:
Satu hal yang paling terasa dari Accor Hotels adalah tagline “Feel Welcome”-nya. Demikian pula yang aku rasakan di Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada yang merupakan rebranding dari All Seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada. Keramahan, kehangatan, ditambah kemewahan dari Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada secara sukses memikatku pada saat pertama memasukinya.

Memadainya fasilitas untuk bisnis dan nyaman untuk liburan, satu alasan lain mengapa Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada aku rekomendasikan. Dengan rate yang masih terjangkau, dibandingkan hotel sekelas di sekitarnya, rasanya wajar kalau Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada termasuk hotel dengan okupansi yang tinggi. Belum lagi pilihan aktivitas dan kuliner yang tersedia, tentu semakin menggiurkan bila melihat rate per malamnya.

Sudah lama rasanya aku tidak menginap di Jakarta dan kali ini di Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada aku merasakan Jakarta yang bukan Jakarta. Dalam arti, lokasi strategis di tengah kota tetapi kenyamanan dan suasananya membuatku bagaikan sedang liburan di luar Jakarta.
title: Liburan Asyik di Hotel Bisnis Tengah Kota

text: Dalam sebulan ini saya dua kali menginap di Hotel All Seasons Gajah Mada Jakarta. Tgl 13-14 dan 27-29 Jan. Yang selalu membuat saya kembali ke hotel ini adalah sambutan dan keramahan staf, mulai dari Security, Receptionist hingga House Keeping. Ramah dan responsif pada tamu sehingga terasa seperti di tengah keluarga. Dan mereka ingat nama, khususnya buat Eugene yang selalu menyambut dengan senyum khasnya. Berkesan dan berkelas. Kamar bagus, bersih dan luas. Pilihan makanan di resto juga banyak. Sempat pindah kamar karena AC bocor tiba tiba shg lantai basah dan saya terjatuh, tetapi mereka cepat tanggap. Hotel ini akan selalu menjadi pilihan saya setiap kali ke Jakarta karena di pusat kota. Hanya, kualitas internetnya buruk dan kalau ada acara di lantai 2, suaranya sampai ke lantai 6. Lebih enak dan tenang mulai lantai 7 sd 9. Maju terus dan pertahankan pelayanan
title: All Seasons yang penuh warna

owner_response.text:
Kepada pengguna tripadvisor yang terhormat,

Terima kasih banyak telah membagikan pengalaman Anda menginap di all seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada di tripadvisor!

Pertama-tama, saya ingin memohon maaf atas kebocoran AC yang terjadi pada saat bapak menginap. Menurut laporan yang saya terima dari Eugene selaku yang bertugas pada saat kejadian tersebut, pihak teknisi kami segera memperbaiki AC tersebut. Saya gembira mengetahui bahwa petugas kami cepat tanggap, dan tidak merusak pengalaman bapak menginap di hotel kami.

Sungguh sebuah kehormatan bagi kami semua untuk menyambut Anda di hotel kami lagi, lagi, dan lagi. Saya harap kami semua dapat terus memberikan pelayanan terbaik kami seiring kembalinya Anda ke all seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada. Merupakan suatu kebanggaan bagi saya mengetahui bahwa Anda sangat senang dengan kamar kami yang bagus, bersih, dan luas, serta keberagaman menu di sTREATs restaurant kami, serta keramahan staff kami yang membuat Anda merasa seperti berada di tengah-tengah keluarga—karena memang kami tidak hanya menanggap tamu kami sebagai seorang tamu, tetapi merupakan bagian dari keluarga besar all seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada yang sangat kami pedulikan, perhatikan, dan hormati. Staff kami yang bernama Eugene secara khusus menitip salam terima kasih atas apresiasi Anda terhadapnya.

Perihal preferensi kamar Anda telah saya sampaikan ke departemen terkait agar pada kedatangan Anda selanjutnya, dapat kami realisasikan berdasarkan ketersediaan kamar. Serta untuk kualitas internet, kami sedang dalam pergantian penyedia jasa internet, diharapkan pada kedatangan Anda selanjutnya pelayanan yang kami berikan dapat lebih maksimal dari segala aspek.

Sekali lagi terima kasih banyak atas apresiasi yang Anda berikan terhadap pelayanan all seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada. Kami sungguh menantikan kehadiran Anda kembali di tengah-tengah kami.

Salam hangat,

David Kalalo
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Check in dan check out sangat cepat. Resepsionisnya ramah dan menyenangkan. Sepanjang berada di hotel ini, saya senantiasa mendapatkan senyum ramah dr staf hotel. Late check out dan layanan titip bagasi juga sangat mudah didapatkan. Resepsionis menunjukkan diri sangat memahami kebutuhan tamu. Mereka juga sangat piawai mengingat nama tamu. Seandainya saya masih ingat nama mereka, akan saya tuliskan di sini. 

Interior hotel juga adalah salah satu alasan menginap di sini. Segar dan kreatif. 

Walau agak kecil, kolam renang bersih dan menyenangkan. Airnya juga OK.

Jalan pintas ke plaza tua Gajah Mada cukup bermanfaat. Walau melalui loading dock plaza yg agak kotor namun yang penting aman dan cepat.

Sarapan cukup bervariasi. Kualitas makanan dan minuman OK. Saya senang ada variasi sambal khas nusantara.

Cakupan Wifi luas. Sinyal kuat. Akses internet sama sekali bukan masalah.

Tidak ada kritikan dan saran buat hotel ini. Segalanya menyenangkan.

TripAdvisor perlu memperbarui status hotel ini sebagai hotel bintang 4. Bukan bintang 3.
title: Hotel yg Menyenangkan

text: Merayakan malam tahun baru di All Season Gajahmada. Booking via accor jauh hari sebelumnya dan memperoleh harga yang bersahabat. Malam tahun baru hotel full sehingga susah memperoleh tempat parkir. Petugas front desk cukup ramah karena tadinya kamar saya diberi smoking room dan krn saya tidak merokok maka request non smoking room. Ada panggung new year berefek kolam renang tutup jam 2 siang. Kolam renang berukuran mini karena space terbatas. Perlengkapan kamar standar tetapi lampu koridor kamar remang-remang. Menu breakfast sangat bervariasi tetapi karena hotel full dan space terbatas jd breakfast baru bisa jam 10 dan ada sebagian menu yg habis. Pihak hotel harusnya bisa mengantisipasi kondisi full di akhir tahun.

text:
Menginap selama 4 malam di All Seasons karena ada urusan pekerjaan di Jakarta. Sebelumnya sudah pernah menginap selama 2 kali di All Seasons dan tidak ada masalah. Namun kali ini pelayanan kurang memuaskan, saat malam tiba seringkali lampu padam, walaupun selang 30 detik sudah hidup kembali, namun hal tersebut lumayan mengganggu karena terjadi hampir setiap malam selama saya menginap disana. Petugas yang membersihkan kamar juga terlihat asal-asalan, karena seprei hanya ditaruh kembali ke posisi yang benar tanpa merapikan seprei/selimut (sehingga terlihat lecek). Shower area adalah yang paling kurang pas desainnya, karena saat kita mandi bisa saja ada genangan air yang mengganggu kita dan bisa sampai menggenangi area kering di kamar mandi.
Untuk sarapan menurut saya sudah enak, terutama bakery nya, tapi untuk pudingnya rasanya perlu ditingkatkan lagi. Saat sarapan pagi ramai sekali sampai susah mencari tempat duduk, terutama antara jam 7-8 pagi.
Parkir disini gratis, sekuritinya ramah.
title: Sedikit Mengecewakan

Kami sangat menghargai ulasan dan saran anda atas kekurangan pelayanan kami, tentu ini akan menjadi perhatian khusus terutama bagi pihak departemen yang terkait. Kami akan melakukan perbaikan untuk ke depannya, agar tidak terjadi kesalahan yang sama di kemudian hari.

text:
Kami tinggal selama tiga malam di kamar Suite.  Meskipun hotel ini tergolong baru (tidak lebih dari tiga tahun beroperasi), kebersihannya kurang.  Sarung bantalnya bernoda.  Handuknya dekil dan kurang bersih.  Dinding kamar mandi nya pun berjamur.  Hati-hati dengan lantai kamar mandinya yang licin terutama pada saat basah.  Sepertinya petugas kebersihan tidak sungguh-sungguh membereskan kamar tamu.  Di hari pertama, tersedia dua handuk mandi dan dua handuk kecil.  Di hari kedua,  dua handuk mandi dan satu handuk kecil.  Di hari ketiga, handuk kecil tidak disediakan.
Penerangan di dalam kamar agak gelap bagi saya yang menyukai cahaya lampu yang terang.  Wi-fi nya payah. Kami mendapat kamar di lantai 8 yang letaknya di atas restoran.  Kalau malam bunyi generatornya sangat berisik.
Sebelumnya kami hanya memesan kamar untuk dua malam, namun karena sesuatu hal, kami memutuskan untuk menginap satu malam lagi.  Hari pertama cek in, mereka meminta jaminan sebesar Rp2,500,000 yang dibebankan ke kartu kredit saya.  Pada hari kedua saat meminta perpanjangan, suami saya meminta jaminan di kartu kredit saya dibatalkan dan sebagai gantinya, ia memberikan kartu kreditnya yang dibebankan sebanyak Rp3,500,000.  Sore hari nya, saat saya hendak naik lift ke kamar, kartu tidak berfungsi.  Ketika saya menanyakan ke front office, salah seorang staf pria mengatakan bahwa saya harus menambah jaminan.  Saya menanyakan bukankah suami saya sudah memberikan kartu kreditnya saat perpanjangan kamar tapi pria tersebut bersikukuh bahwa jaminan harus ditambah karena sampai dengan hari itu sudah terpakai Rp2.500.000.  Meskipun saya tidak mengerti, karena saya sedang bersama anak, saya berikan kembali kartu kredit saya.  Malam harinya saat suami saya kembali, ia menjelaskan bahwa deposito sudah dibebankan ke kartu kreditnya dan minta agar jaminan pada kartu kredit saya dibatalkan kembali agar tidak terjadi double-charge.   Saat itu tidak ada permintaan maaf sama sekali dari pihak hotel.
Keesokkan paginya, saat saya dan suami sedang keluar hotel,  pihak hotel berkali-kali menelpon ke kamar untuk menanyakan apakah kami jadi memperpanjang kamar.  Saat itu hanya ada pengasuh anak bersama anak kami di dalam kamar.  Pengasuh anak kami sampai kebingungan menjawab telpon yang bertubi-tubi tersebut.
Tidak ada kesan baik yang kami dapat dari hotel ini selama menginap di sana untuk pertama kalinya.
title: Kualitas tidak sesuai dengan harga kamar

Pada kunjungan ke-2, ada 2 receptionis stand by melayani tamu.  Keduanya seperti ada problem dengan tamu yang dilayani, sehingga antrean tamu yang akan chek-in cukup panjang. Pada kunjungan ke-3, hanya ada 1 receptionist stand by, dimana receptionist tersebut harus menghandle 3 customer yang requestnya cukup banyak. Sekali lagi saya harus menunggu lama sekali hanya untuk chek in. Sama sekali tidak ada insyatif dari receptionist tsb untuk memanggil temannya/manager on duty untuk membantu pekerjaannya. 
Hotel senyaman apapun apabila service lemot akan menjadi tidak menyenangkan.

text:
I would like to share my experience staying in Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada which took place in early December last year. I decided to stay in this hotel since I had an early morning appointment to attend the next day in CBD area of Jakarta. 

Since I had stayed in Ibis Jakarta Harmoni the week before, I decided to stay in this particular hotel property. The hotel had confirmed that they would prepare my room for early check-in that day. However, since I had to finish some work prior to checking in the hotel, I arrived in the hotel around noon that day.

Check-in was prompt and efficient. Within 10 minutes, I have entered my suite room which was located in the 7th floor (Room 708). The room was huge (bigger than most rooms we can find in any Ibis or Ibis Styles), clean and well maintained. It has a separate area for living room and bedroom area which was really nice. It also has a door we can close and function as double door to reduce noise level.

Although the room was located near the elevator but I didn't hear anything from my room (good soundproof). Breakfast in the morning was good : Breakfast spread was good and food quality was above average (better than the ones served in Ibis Jakarta Harmoni).

This hotel is located around the corner of Gajah Mada Plaza, a famous establishment in Kota area. There is an access entrance from Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada going to Gajah Mada Plaza although I didn't really recommend using it especially after 6:00 pm. This hotel is also located steps away from TransJakarta bus stop and there are many different food options someone can find inside Gajah Mada Plaza and in the nearby area which makes it an ideal hotel to stay.

Based on my experience staying in this particular hotel, I am comfortably provide them with a 4 stars' rating and I strongly recommend this hotel to every one who is looking for quality hotel accommodation in the next trips to Jakarta in the near future.
title: Better than expected stay in Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada...

text:
I liked the hotel location. The "busway" terminal was very close so going further north or south of the city was a breeze. 

The hotel although being a budget type of hotel was comfortable and welcoming and the staff were extremely friendly and helpful particularly the restaurant manager.

The second floor was often busy as it had functions there. The lift was at times full and slow because of this.

I stayed on the 5th floor in one of the larger rooms next to the fire stairs. The large solid door at the end of the corridor next to the fire stairs was banging continuously during the first night keeping me awake. I complained in the morning and it was quiet after that.

The room was nice and large with a comfortable bed and the bathroom was a good size however the bathroom may be smaller in the standard rooms. One of the lights in the bathroom could not be turned off which bothered me so an engineer came and disconnected it.

Breakfast was adequate however if you came later than earlier the offerings were not as generous or as fresh. The coffee served from the barista was much better than the auto coffee machine.

You can access the shopping Gajah Mada shopping mall from the rear of the hotel next to the pool and although i'ts an old tired Mall there's a good supermarket in the basement and a decent money changer near the reception area at the north entrance.

I discovered a fantastic massage establishment on the 3rd floor of the Mall where I enjoyed a  delightful daily foot massage after walking all around Jakarta.

I look forward to returning to this hotel in the next few months.
title: Great location

text: This is a great hotel. Why you may asked? Because of the location and the people there who served you humbly with a great smile (plus beautiful ladies over at the check in counter!). I was there for 3 nights in October 2016 and I felled in love with it. Its located near the chaotic Kota area but manageable as its 10 minutes away from the shopping belt of Jakarta which is Plaza Indonesia/Grand Indonesia area. Behind it (accessible by a short cut route via the coffee house) is the grand old dame of Plaza Gajah Mada, a 30 year old mall but still practical with homely feels. You can get your medicines here from  the chemist, great cafe (Jco...good donuts), Matahari being your last minute shopping place for gifts or the occasional undies, and phletora of restaurants. Not to forget there are 2 massage place where you can relax and unwind with a very2 cheap price and great ambiance. The room rate I got as about USD 45 per night inclusive of breakfast and I guess its a steal! Go and book your room away people!

text:
I was here for a leisure/business trip and stayed for 7 nights. It has been a pleasurable stay and I would have given a 5 if it wasn't for the small little problems.

Getting there:
From the airport, we took Uber. It was about 45 minutes drive at night. Some of our friends have suggested using Uber as our means to get around the city. It is affordable. Get a sim card at the airport (which costs me about IDR125k, for data only). Make sure you read the instructions when using Uber as you need to go to the parking lot. It was a bit tough for us as it was dark and we were not familiar with the surroundings. But taking Uber is way cheaper than a taxi (a colleague of mine spent IDR400k while I spent about IDR100k). Make sure you have some loose change for the parking and toll.

Check in:
Check in was alright until I encountered some problems with my booking. As this was part leisure part business, I made a separate reservation on my own and missed a night out. The receptionist was patient and told me to either go ahead with booking online or at the walk in rates. Despite online rates were lower, she kept smiling and patiently waited for my reservation email to go through. It took some time but she assured she she would get it settled once she received it. And yes she did and I did not have to worry about no rooms to stay for the 7 nights.

Lifts:
To get to the room, you need to use the access card at the lifts as well. Just be mindful not to put those cards near electronic devices for too long. We had to reset our cards a couple of times.

Room:
We booked the superior double. Room was clean, with a view of the main road. There was a comfy chair and a working desk. There were not closets but shelves to place your clothes and belongings.

If you are sensitive to sound, would suggest to ask for a room away from the main street as it can get quite noisy at night, and day, depending on how often you leave the room.

Room is dimly lit so for those who need to work, your best bet is the light at the work station. 

There's centralised air conditioning, which we noted despite after switching off the air conditioner (which was rather cold even when the temperatures were risen to 30 degrees and at 1 fan). If you are not fond of the cold, just switch off the air conditioner.

Walls are quite thin as you can hear sounds from other rooms. Next door had on a marketing sermon (really?) and you can hear the hair dryers from other rooms.

The bed was not too bad, good enough for a night's sleep. We were provided with 2 pillow and 2 bolsters.

Windows have 2 roller curtains, one sheer and one black out. You get a great view at night, provided you are ok with the sound.

There's about 2 wall multi electricity adapters so you need not worry if you forgot to bring yours.

Toilet:
New hotels nowadays, instead of a wall, have a glass wall instead. Your privacy is protected with the frosted window film. 

Toiletries are basic with the all-for-one shampoo/shower gel in the shower. There's only one glass divider between the shower and the toilet. Do expect when showering, the toilet will get wet. 

Hairdryers cannot be detached but they are user friendly that you only need to hold the handle to use it (not like those which you have you to press the button long)

The one problem we had with the toilet was the stench. There was a stench that came after the toilets are not used for long. No matter what we did we could not get rid of it. We closed the door most of the door or else it would seep into the room. 

When we called housekeeping, the only solution was air freshener. This was the biggest problem throughout my stay. Otherwise, it would have been perfect.

Other facilities (room):
Basic tea making sets, safety deposit box (which we could not use since it was locked but didn't really bother us), disposable room slippers, fridge (which was more of a wine chiller instead of a regular fridge).

Breakfast:
Breakfast is served from 6am to 10am and the spread is quite limited. Main dishes usually change from a fish to a chicken dish and a traditional soup/noodle dish. I'm not a picky eater and quite ok with having to eat the same thing for a week.

Other facilities:
Didn't get to enjoy the pool but it's good for a dip. Wifi is quite reasonable here although you have login again when you are out of the room, at the lobby and back to the room.  There's a spa here as well although not sure which floor it is. 

Around the area:
There's a small mall next to it if you need to buy some supplies or have lunch or dinner. There's also a cinema if you start to get bored of being stuck in the jam.

There are some fast food joints nearby as well if you fancy a short walk. Or walk another 10 minutes for some local food. 

Getting around the area:
Most of the time, we just use Uber. Expect some waiting time due to the traffic conditions. We usually spend 10-15 minutes waiting for one. We usually head out to Grand Indonesia or some malls nearby (do some of your research) for dinner or quick shopping. Uber rates are quite reasonable. You can take your chance taking the go-jeks or public transport but we have been advised not too. 

This place is a great place to stay and would definitely consider this place again in the future.
title: Week long stay

text:
We stayed for three nights in July and returned in August for another three nights
Staff: very polite.
Check-in: smooth and fast.
Internet: free wifi that works fine.
Rooms: 
Relatively spacious and overall clean - at least the room we had in the fifth floor. However, on our second stay, we were given a room in the third floor where we found multiple cockroaches, first in the bathroom and then under the desk in the room. We informed the reception and staff arrived, equipped with insect spray, assuring us the room would be cleared of cockroaches. We insisted that we wanted to change the room, and after some initial hesitation and the claim that no other rooms were available, we were given an upgrade to what we were told was a suite (basically just a bigger room). This room was then cockroach-free.
Other than that: Rooms have sufficient sockets, a safe, a fridge, complimentary water.
In bathroom: Complimentary toothbrush & toothpaste; shower gel in a dispenser. Only one towel per person (in the suite there were two).
One issue that bothered us and that is not the fault of the hotel, but that somehow needs to be addressed: many guests left room doors open while in their rooms, with the TV on, smoking,  loudly talking etc. This gets very annoying.
Breakfast: quite good (there is an egg station that made very good omelets); also cappuccino. My only complaint was that dishes were not signed out as to whether they were suitable for vegetarians/ vegans (i.e. the ingredients).
Did not find any restaurants with a garden close by, but luckily, the hotel-restaurant was good. Dinner is served in the restaurant as well as in the inside court, next to the swimming pool.  Some vegetarian options (e.g. ask for noodles to be served without chicken), prices very reasonable and quite delicious.
Location: quite good. Located next to a shopping mall where there you can find coffee shops (one is 24h), an exchange service (with good rates), a supermarket in the basement, a pharmacy etc. (and a bit further on there is also a local supermarket where you can find Breezers).
Taxi from the airport was about 150.000Rp, taxi to Gambir Station, Monas and the museum 25.000-30.000 Rp. 
For about 45 Euro per night, incl. breakfast, this hotel was value for money.
title: Good choice

Well this is an Accor poperty, so the basic standards are maintained. The prices are low, and they also offer free breakfast. No one can or should complain here, despite the menu being limited. 

Rooms are quite decent, not big but clean. Nicely designed with some wall art. 
The wifi works well. 
The beds are comfortable. 

The bathrooms a tad small but again quite okay if you are not with family. 

Not very far from the Central Business District. 

The area Gajah Mada isn't quite exciting but as mentioned above, its not far from the main CBD and so is okay. 

Recommend this property for budget conscious people.

text:
I stay for one night (1-2 Aug 15), the hotel is easy to find and help me a lot while booking process (i tried to pay with debit card and previously ask the management about payment method via e-mail, the response was very quick and helpful!)
 
Room: Nice and clean room, no strange smell and complete amenities. I really like the bed. But i somehow feel the TV Channels are so incomplete.

Location: It's slighty off from the center of the city, but the Jakarta main public transport system TransJakarta's Gajah Mada shelter, is on walking distance to the hotel, so it's easy to reach Jakarta's even furthest places (well, expect the delay of the bus' poor services). The hotel also sits beside an old shopping mall, Gajah Mada Plaza. So, shopping and dining is not that hard to find.

Food: The breakfast, variation is ok, but taste is unstable. Enjoyable enough, but leave a strange taste, eg: My first plate of fried noodle (leftovers) is not as good as my second try (after refill).

Staff: Well, the reception is kind enough for me. But please don't let a "solo" receptionist do all the work on Sunday morning.

Overall: Good Hotel, Good Location. Great price per performance. Good Staff.

Something off? It's my room view... it's next building's parking lot... a bit weird.
title: Clean, Good Location, but something off...

Gonna write this short and simple :- 
Nice location 
Nice hotel 
Nice rooms - big and simple and clean. 

What is there to complain :-

Toilet - Door was too close to the WC. As a smoker, just want to leave the toilet ajar so that the smoke could come out. Ventilation fan in toilet was not working. 
TV - Some of the movie channels were not clear. 
WIFI - annoying as I had to keep on relogging in. 
Breakfast - so so but OK and palatable. Just make sunny side up eggs with toasted bread. That would work. 

OVERALL - still a good stay for the money paid. LOVE IT !

text:
Staying here just few days ago.

Location was very near halte sawah besar, which will connect you to anywhere on jakarta using busway, it is easy. Near plaza gajah mada (small mall) in case you need to buy something, and 7-11 just across the street from gajah mada plaza.
This hotel use blue bird as their taxi, but not standby often.
The room was so clean and spacious enough for me and my friend as we have a lot of stuff to be handled.
Aside from clean room, i was really happy and also a bit dissapointed at the same time about additional bolster (which is great) but without tube case (which was a little annoying).
Most of staff service is great, especially Mr. Bayu as security there, which helped me with my heavy stuff. However, front desk are empty at 1 am as i arrived to rest.
Try to call operator from my room to set me morning call, but they not calling me. Hopefully i set my phone too.

Internet was the worst here, i could not even connect to it.
Lastly, breakfast was not good. 
For the rate and the service, overall it is still a little bit expensive.

Also for your hospitality. Not my first time there, certainly won't be the last.

text:
We, family of four, stay at Ibis Styles Gajah Mada for one night (Dec 25, 2020) during the peak of Covid-19 in Jakarta. The Hotel was almost empty. Which suits us well.... :-). Receptionist, security guard and room boy all was courteous (as we seems to be the only guest).
We got connecting Room 918 and 920. Room is basic, but function well. Breakfast was only two choices, American and Indonesian served to room (we understood the covid-19 situation, so no complaint). For Chinese food lover, the hotel is well located. Angke Restaurant is just in front of this Hotel. And Sinar Lestari Restaurant (famous for Head Fish Soup, which is Fish Soup) is not far away. Alas, when we stayed, due to covid-19, all food establishment was closed on 7pm. So must prepare well in advance when and how to order the food. As this is a budget hotel, it meets all our expectation.
title: Great Location

The room was clean,well lighted. The bed was cozy too. The room is well equipped with all the lady needs(a hair dryer). 
The breakfast is very simple but filled with variety of food. The chef comes out once in a while to check on things. 
We then took a walk to the mall adjacent which can be done through a small door hidden in the walls. Very convenient.
In short,it was well worth it although it's a very short stay.

text:
I spent 2 nights there and it turns out to be one of the best ibis hotels that I've ever stayed. It's all because the hospitality at its best performed by the majority of the staff there.

The location itself is great as it is located right in the heart of Jakarta which provides ample transportation options to choose from.

The hotel and its facilities are still up to ibis standard and I have no complain about it.

I had minor issues with the equipments in room but they were resolved within 15 minutes. The engineering staff were also courteous.

One staff worth mentioning for the impeccable hospitality is Ms. Nita Lestari. She checked me in hassle-free, notified my Gold status membership and treated me accordingly.
A
During my stay, I need a business center service and she assisted me well. I only need her to copy my document but she did an extra mile by scanning it without even being asked.

She also informed me a BBQ night on my check-in day and when she saw me on restaurant that evening, she cared enough to ask whether I enjoy the food or not. Nobody from FB department did the same.

Overall, it was a pleasant stay. This property definitely will be my priority for my next stay in Jakarta. See you soon!
title: Impeccable Service

The staff is friendly and always smiling. They also have a little play area for children. I just wish they have some type of barrier from the pool to seating area outside so we don’t have to smell the cigarette smoke while swimming as it’s affecting our health. text:
This hotel might have actually done better if they didn't start with giving me consecutively 2 badly smelling rooms - one with a smell of mould, the other - of sewage. Terrible start - so bad that I was really close to booking somewhere else and then complaining and requesting a refund. However, then they understood they need to do something, they got key cards for 3 more rooms, and even the first of them was OK, so I agreed to stay.

The rooms are typical of Ibis Styles, simple and clean (well, when they don't smell badly), comfortable enough and spacious enough. Breakfast was even better than expected, but wifi was useless most of the time. It worked for a few minutes, then was almost gone for twice as much. When I made the ping test, I discovered at the bad moments they had over 80% packet loss. Even when it was good, packet loss was at least 20%.

The hotel's location isn't bad, however the street noises are a bit too much for my taste, even at the 8th floor. And worst of all, neighboring room noises were even louder - I had a coughing man the first night and a noisy baby the next 2. Plus some high heels that didn't get tired of walking in the last 2 days...
title: Not very impressive for a 4-star

text:
This is my second time after few years ago stay here (the property still named All Seasons at that time). We stay 3 nights, 4 until 7 June 2019 and I book 3 rooms.
Although check in process was very smooth, but they missing some benefit that I always get as Accor Plus member. I didn't get welcome letter, welcome drink and offer for late check out.
1 room I upgraded free using Accor Plus voucher, which I got deluxe room 801. The rest 2 rooms is superior 1018 and 1020 (connecting).
My room 801, the air con a little bit hot, which I already set the fan high and temperature minimum. Already complain, they did some work but not really solved.
At the first night I try to dinner with my parents as well in their restaurant as they had promo all food discount 50%. Food taste was average, but we need to wait very long time until it was served, noticed that only us dine in at that restaurant, waiting time totally not acceptable.
Breakfast also served in lobby restaurant, taste was standard. Even at third day, there's some mistakes from the chef as they serve sausage with plastic, we cannot eat that. Other guest already complain this, they change it and say the reason is because they change supplier. From the food quality control this is unacceptable as it dangerous especially for kids that like sausage.
Other facilities is as 3 star standard hotel, swimming pool, kids corner, lift (1 lift is under maintenance at that time, only 1 is work).
There's also door access to Gajah Mada Plaza through swimming pool.
It's far beyond my expectation comparing my first stay in here few years ago. Hopefully they can improve the services.
title: Family hotel

text: I took my first-ever trip to Indonesia over the weekend and stayed here (It's going through a name change, so it's also the Ibis Styles Gajah Mada). Solid comfort: clean room, comfortable bed, excellent view outside. It's also easy to get picked up and dropped off if you're using Grab to get around. Loved the food: I suggest you skip Western things like bread and pastry and enjoy traditional dishes like mie goreng, laksa, and kueh at the breakfast buffet; order the nasi ayam cobek from room service. Big thanks to Anissa who helped me check in, as well as all the staff for being great at their work,

text:
We experienced an outstanding service during our 9 day stay there,
It's a budget hotel that mainly caters for meetings and other groups of guests. Despite all of its limitations (no fitness room, no guest laundry, tiny -no door- shower room), the staff showed their maximum effort to answer our needs and responded promptly to our suggestions, Eugine and Monica are two outstanding young ladies who served their customers with joy, and were willing to go the extra mile. Kudos to them.
Personally, I would say that the hotel prepared too many varieties of food for breakfast, some of them just average, few below average, but many of them are excellent.  Less varieties with all excellent food probably better. The egg station is a plus. The coffee machine needs upgrading.
Location is the best factor for those who wants to explore West and Central Jakarta. We rode Trans Jakarta Bus, taxi, and Grab easily. On foot we can find varieties of food from not-so-hygienic street food to middle-upper class restaurants.
title: Excellent location

text: The bedroom is neat and well equipped with a mini fridge, water kettle, flat screen TV and hair dryer. The AC is working perfectly well. Our room was on the 9th floor so I was having doubts about the speed of the elevator. My doubts were misplaced somehow because the elevator moves very swiftly. The electricity in the room works with your room key much to my surprise. No waste of energy and the environment is less burdened. More hotels should adopt these policy. Another thing that definitely should be mentioned is the breakfast buffet style which is included in the room rate. Fresh fruits, a variety of juices, muffins and other bakery products and even hot meals are served. A very well balanced and varied breakfast. The location of the hotel is also ideal. A lot of attractions (Chinatown, museums, zoo, etc.) are within a radius of less then 6 miles. Upscale malls are also close to the hotel. Just around the corner of the hotel the Gajah Mada mall (a 3 story building) is located hosting a department store, a hyper mart, and fast food restaurants among other stores. Hotel guests do not need to go out on the street to get to the mall. They can take the “back door” behind the hotel restaurant. The hotel staff who are very friendly are more than willing to assist you. Supri and Eddie were very helpful to us and always more than happy to provide us with suggestions and tips. In general the staff is very friendly and polite. The hotel also has a large swimming pool. There is almost nothing to complain about but there is one thing that is less satisfactory. The towels obviously need to be replaced and only body towels are placed in the bathroom. Providing facial towels is recommendable. Overall the hotel is comfortable to stay and definitely located on a good spot.
title: Modest outlook but majestic service...

owner_response.text:
Dear henri t,

First of all, thank you very much for taking time to review us on tripadvisor!

I feel so delighted reading your detailed review—from the bedroom, facilities, breakfast, to our strategic location and the friendliness of our staff, especially Supri and Eddie who were very helpful to you.

..and yes! We are doing our best to put one of Accor's programs on action—Planet 21. We are aiming to provide a positive hospitality experience, and one of Planet 21's key achievements is called "Planet for Planet". At AccorHotels, we ask our customers to reuse their towels. Savings made on water and energy are used to fund tree planting.
One tree is planted every minute.

It is a pleasure to receive positive feedback. I will definitely share this with our all seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada family—including Supri and Eddie—as I believe this will serve as a motivation for us all to maintain and improve our quality, and to continue serving none but the best.

Regarding the facial towel, actually we do have face towel for the Deluxe and Suite type of room—but, it could also be given on request for our guest who stays in Superior room.

Thank you very much one again, henri t, for sharing your valuable experience with us.

We definitely can not wait to have you back at all seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada!

Happy Holidays, henri t!

Best Regards,

David Kalalo
General Manager

text: For the price of this hotel, purchased on kayak, I did not expect much from this hotel. I have stayed in Indonesia before multiple times in multiple cities. I will start with the staff. The staff were always extremely friendly even by Indonesian standards. Most knew basic English, managers were able to carry a full conversation with you, and they always seemed happy to try to communicate the best they could with you. The room and all of the facilities were kept clean. The complimentary breakfast bar was amazing. Definitely beat the hotels in America. No matter what kind of breakfast you prefer this place had it. The hotel is centrally located in Jakarta. It even has a back door, that has a guard at it for your safety, that leads to the mall behind it. The mall has several places to eat and a computer room that you are able to print and copy at. The hotel is uber and grab friendly. The WiFi is decent at this hotel. You have to enter your password again as you switch floors but overall was decent connection. The only thing the hotel could have done any better was have a fitness room. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
title: Pleasantly surprised

text:
The location is good. Easy to find by Google Map. Near Gajah Mada Plaza, so we easily find food and daily needs.
Good price.
The room was clean and comfortable.
The staffs are friendly and attentive. We had our room prepared completed with the baby cot I requested by phone before. So the check in process was so quick and smooth.
There are children pool and playground which clean enough. There were security near the children area. They're watching the children and very friendly.
The problems are the bathroom and the breakfast.
The bathroom was too slippery and the water drain is put in the wrong direction (reversed the tile tilt) so the water can't run down smoothly and quickly. The bathmat was directly all wet right after the shower. The housekeeping quickly changed it.
The breakfast menu was so various but the taste needs improvement, especially for the Indonesian food. The only tasty stall was the bakery.
title: Comfy Short Stay for Both Business and Family

text:
I arrived in Jakarta at the Airport with the goal visit a friend. I couldn't reach him so I asked the Cab driver for a nice and not to expensive Hotel in a nice Neighborhood in City Center. So he brought me here!!))
Starting with the security before entering the lobby it was all perfect. The Receptionist "Tito" was so delightful and made my arriving so easy and welcome that I just wanted to stay here. The lobby was perfect organized, the Restaurant the Bar the Patio - everything just the way I like. Perfect rooms and very clean and good smelling. Really nice Bathroom and perfect Wifi. I wanted to go out for a walk and of course Tito took care of my route. After one hour walking I decided to go back and having a drink at the bar of my Hotel. After a few minutes I started to chat with a very elegant and maybe smartest person I've ever met in those kind of situations and of course no wonder it was the General Manager Dave in his after work- so no badges. What a Gentleman!!!Our conversation was about 2 hours and I really hope that I can stay in touch with him and maybe become friends. With Tito the same btw. After delightful sleep I met Dave during my checking out and he even organized me a transfer to the airport, for free. I'll come back that's for sure. I'm saying thank you to the great staff of these pleasant Hotel.
title: One night in Jakarta

text:
Going to Jakarta for the first time coming from Bali was an eye opener and a shock Jakarta is a over crowded city with cars, lorries, people carriers, taxis and scooters where every one is fight for their inch of space on the road, it polluted with exhaust fumes, heat and the air is dirty and not cheap. Choosing your hotel is necessary because you may be in a 5 star hotel but you could be on the outskirts of the city but that is when your problem starts because the traffic is nose to tail on every road or back street. Or as I saw a 5 Star hotel smack bang next too a motorway.
The All seasons hotel offers comfortable priced rooms good service based in the city close to a mall for shopping in 5 minutes walking distance of the hotel with restaurants and coffee bars, banks near by, plus very comfortable rooms it is just a B&B hotel
The only problem is at 4 am in the morning you have the calling to prayer sounding for 20 minutes. The staff are friendly and helpful and although you have to pay a 500,000 waver fee for in case of damages at the front desk on booking in for the price is was perfect.
Breakfast was continental and Asian range with taxi waiting out side the hotel.
The hotel gives you free wi fi and i never found it noisy at all although you can hear the lift going up and down, it all depends where you have come from in the first place. If you are an American and you have everything done for you, then don't come too Jakarta.
Travelling from the airport to the city can take from 45 minutes too 2 hours because of the traffic congestion. Expect no frills in Jakarta is is overcrowded with shanty villages, refuse dumps with in the city boundary 35 meters square and 6 meters high that back onto the river where it is dumped into the olive drab filthy river. 
You can stay in the bigger plush hotels but then if you require to get out onto the road then your problems will start.Until they put in a mono rail system and ban many cars from the city it will never change, I was glad to leave just after one day to get back too Bali
title: picking the best 5*hotel doesn't always mean the best location

text:
My husband and I arrived at this hotel quite late, around 11pm. We were very tired after the late flight, and just wanted to go and rest in our room. Instead, upon the check in, the front desk told us we need to provide a deposit and when my card failed on their machine, they kept on trying. It held us over 15 minutes at the lobby, just for the deposit. They made sure again, that we booked a non smoking room, even asked my husband to sign an agreement that we won't be smoking in our room. It was perfect, as I have asthma and can not stand the smoke. We got room 722, and the room was okay, the road traffic, you could barely hear from this room. After the long wait at the lobby we finally had a good night sleep.
Things changed on second night though, when we got back to our room at night we started to smell smoke from cigarette, and when we called the operator, they told us, they opened the whole 7th floor for a big group, and now it turned to be smoking floor. And assure us that our room is still non smoking room. I assumed they were joking, but they were not. I can not stand the smoke smell, and asked to be moved. They moved us to room 1004 in an hour after the complain. Which was okay, until we found out that room 1004 located near the roof top, and they have some sort of machine that made a loud whirring sound every second minutes, NON STOP!!! We called again, since my husband and I would not be able to have good night sleep with that disturbing whirring sound. They said, they have no other room but 1004 and 722. So, the options only smoking smell, or whirring sound. Perfect!
The third night, they moved us again to room 812, facing the road, with road noise during the day and night. But, since it was our last night, we just take the room and bear with it. But, what kind of hotel asked you several times that your room will be non smoking room, in a non smoking floor, even asked you to sign an agreement not to smoke in your room, and then open the whole floor to be non smoking floor without even a warning or anything to another guest? Especially one that specifically told them we can not handle smoke? Such a non sense!
The hotel itself is designed more to cater big groups, even the lay out of the breakfast restaurants, with all the long table, like you are eating in a seminar room. The food are not fresh, the tea is not warm, such a disappointment, since I moved from All Seasons Thamrin to this hotel because I read such a good review on Trip Advisor about this hotel. One word from us: NEVER AGAIN!
title: Booked a non smoking room, signed a non smoking agreement at front desk, and placed in a smoking floor. Such a nonsens

text:
Hotel - New and in a central location. Next to a shopping mall with supermarket in the basement.

Room - Clean and cosy. Bed was comfortable and everything was working. Wardrobe was small and they do not provide iron and iron board.

Hotel Amenities - Basic. No swimming pool. Restaurant where breakfast is served and a lounge next to it. An outdoor seating area is available.

Service - Check in took a long time as there was only one receptionist. On the whole everyone was friendly.

Training of front desk needs to improve. They refused to give me a receipt for the hotel bill upon check out. Their reason - the room was prepaid on my Accor membership. Needed some convincing before they relented. We told them that a booking and payment over the internet does not show that we actually stayed in the Hotel and the bill will reflect our room number, check-in and out dates.

Overall good value for money if you are not fussy about service.
title: Good no fuss, frills hotel

Overall, I recommend this hotel to business traveller. Good value for money!!

text:
Located at the back of Gajah Mada mall and directly opposite the landmark Grand Mercure, this hotel is a hidden gem if you seek a great low cost basic facilities that is close to CBD & entertainment. Rooms are super clean, comfortable & even smell nice. If you can live without fancy conveniences and just need a room to sleep, All Seasons GM is perfect.

TIPS: 
1. Blue Bird Taxis easily available at Gajah Mada mall throughout
2. Hotel's food standard is not great, head to gajah mada mall or Hayam Waruk strip for great options or even the local resturant next to the church.
3. Short cut at the back (Cideng Timur) leads to pasar Tanah Abang and CBD quicker
4. Convenience store 6 mins before Gajah mada mall open till late. great for small purchases.
title: Best non-fancy hotel on the strip

Au buffet on ne trouve rien pour un petit déjeuner dit européen, même pas capable de cuire correctement deux œufs sur le plat et la viennoiserie locale ressemble plus à une éponge.

text:
初めてのインドネシア　ジャカルタ旅行だったので、アゴダでいろいろ調べて選んだホテル。理由はロケーションと、プールがあることと、朝食ビュッフェつきで1泊３，５００円程度とリーズナブルな値段だったこと。

ホテル自体はリノベーションしたのか、比較的新しくて清潔感があった。フロント等のスタッフも皆親切だった。

なお、ホテルの部屋とエレベーターにカードキーを利用するが、磁気テープ部分が弱いのか？読み取りエラーが多くて苦労した。

部屋はそこそこ広く、必要なアメニティ類もそろっていて、残念なのはバスタブと冷蔵庫がなかったこと。保冷庫はあまり意味がない。

また、セーフティボックスが使用方法が分かりにくく、結局一度も利用しなかった。

期待していたプールは、食堂から丸見えなとこと、ちょっと小さかったのは残念。

朝食ビュッフェは種類も多く、割と美味かった。

総合的にコストから考えると上等だと思います。また、次回のジャカルタ再訪の際は、もう一度利用したいと思います。
title: コスパのよいホテル。近くにコンビニがないのが残念。

Best Regards, 

Teuku Rusiansyah

text:
Die Zimmer waren modern und sehr sauber. Die Zimmergröße für 2 Personen war genau richtig. 
Der Außenbereich mit Pool war stets gepflegt und man konnte immer eine schöne Abkühlung genießen. 
Das Frühstück war außergewöhnlich lecker und variiert jeden Tag.
In dem Einkaufszentrum direkt neben an bekommt man alles für den Alltag.
Ein persönliches Highlight war die angebotene Tour durch die Stadt Jakarta von Eddy (Hotelpersonal). In einem mit Klimaanlage ausgestatteten und gut riechenden Taxi, kann man alles sehenswerte von Jakarta erkunden. Und das alles für einen sehr guten Preis mit englischsprachigen Führer.
title: Unsere Erwartungen wurden allesamt übertroffen! Exzellentes Hotel.

owner_response.text:

I will share your comment with the entire team as I believe this will be a motivation for us all to maintain and improve our service quality, and feedback like yours is very much appreciated as it helps us on reflecting of what shall we do to give a more satisfying performance.

We hope to welcome you back again very soon at Ibis Styles Jakarta Gajah Mada!

Best Regards,

Teuku Rusiansyah
General Manager

text: 起初我很生气。酒店凭证说宜必思，但地图上没有宜必思酒店。我去了另一个宜必思，他们把我带到了这里。其次，我感到欺诈。该网站说有一个窗口，但事实证明窗口无法打开！如何在没有新鲜空气的情况下待在这一周？幸运的是，我遇到了Eugene，她的个性就像太阳，让我很开心。她很有启发性，有很多旅游观点。她像朋友一样对待我，让我觉得像一扇敞开的窗户一样舒服。每次遇到，她都会问候我。当我找不到我想去的办公室时，她很有爱心，非常乐于助人。当她知道我累了的时候，她给了我一杯饮料，即使我告诉她我没事。因为她，我决定继续留在这里。我希望有一个像她一样的妹妹，所以我的兄弟必须娶她！哈哈哈！我说谢谢你，祝你好运Eugene的事业和一切！早餐味道很好，我主要吃谷物。位置非常靠近地方，酒店后面有一个商场。容易找到食物。房间不是那么大，但足够了。浴室很滑。但是晚上有音乐也很有趣。我是一个困倦的人，所以我在事件结束前早点睡觉。总的来说，它没有我想象的那么糟糕没有窗户。
title: 因为Eugene，没有窗户但仍然非常开心

We wish to welcome you again in the near future.

Best Regards,

Teuku Rusiansyah
General Manager

Kamers schoon en goede badkamer. Helaas geen koffie en thee faciliteiten. Wel klein koekastje. Elke dag twee flesjes water op de kamer. 
Ontbijt prima. Zowel Europees en Aziatisch. Mogelijkheid voor een vers gebakken omelet/ei. 
Al met al een prima hotel voor een goede prijs.

text: Met een groep Surinamers was ik. Bij deze wil ik mas Eko Supriono bedanken voor de service namens All Seasons Gaja Mada. Als chauffeur en begeleider was hij heel goed. Reeds bij mijn eerste dag, toen hij onze koffers naar boven bracht, zag ik zijn bereidwilligheid de gasten te wilen helpen. Zo ver van huis (Suriname) was het prettig, dat het meteen klikte tussen ons. Geen wonder dan dat wij (4) speciaal naar hem vroeg om ons te rijden en te begeleiden om te gaan shoppen. Ontbijt was heel uitgebreid, wat wij niet gewend zijn,voor een keertje kan dat geen kwaad. En wat ook zo prettig was, heb je Rupias over, kan je gauw via achterdeur een Mall binnenstappen, de drukte vermijden. Bedankt, All Seasons Gaja Mada in het byzonder mas Eko Supriono. Groetjes van mevrouw Zweers en de rest van de groep Surinamers.
title: Goede service

text:
Un hôtel avec un très bon emplacement, juste à côté du centre commercial Gajah Mada Plaza. Il faut compter 45 minutes pour aller à l'aéroport, ce qui est très correct quand on est à jakarta. Il n'est pas très loin du Monument National (MONAS), la mosquée Istiqlal et la vieille ville de Jakarta (Kota Tua). 
Les personnels sont très accueillants, et souriants. Le petit dejeuner avec pas mal de choix également. 
Quelques bemols quand meme, on entend le bruit des traffics et la mosquée tres tôt dans la matinée, et aussi les chambres qui sont très mal insonorisées (on entend les pas des voisins, la télé et même leur conversation) !!
title: Bien

text:
ショッピングセンター、ガジャマダプラザの横にあるホテルです。トランスジャカルタ コリドアー1のSawah Besar停留場もすぐそばにあり便利です。

空港からタクシー移動の場合、ホテル名よりガジャマダプラザの方が通じるかもしれません。ただしガジャマダプラザからホテルまで歩こうとすると、オート三輪タクシー（バジャイ）がホテル前まで並んで塞いでいて、車道を歩かなくていけないので、走ってくる車やバイクに注意が必要です。

2泊しましたがチェックイン時、デポジットとして500000IDR必要でした。（チェックアウト時に返金されます）クレジットカードでもいいのかもしれませんが、現金を用意していったほうがいいかもしれません。

部屋はイビススタイルズ系に泊まったことがある方なら大体想像つく通りかと。ペットボトルの水2本が毎日補充されました。セキュリティボックスもありますが、私の部屋にあったものは最初から閉まっていて使用することが出来ませんでした。

シャワー・トイレルームに仕切り扉がないので気をつけないとトイレまで足元がびしょ濡れになります。温度・湯量は問題なく利用できます。

朝食はオムレツを目の前で焼いてくれたり、種類も豊富でなかなかおいしくいただくことができました。

あちこち行くのに必要なら目の前のバジャイを使わなくても、ブルーバードタクシーを呼んでくれますので、問題なく移動できると思います。

この宿泊費でこの内容ならかなりコストパフォーマンスがいいホテルなのではないでしょうか。
title: コストパフォーマンス良し

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Resuyo,

First of All, We would like to say Thank you for your time to give us such a great feedback on Trip Advisor while you stayed at All Seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada.it’s been such a pleasure knowing that you really enjoyed your stay and had a pleasant time, you also like our hotel that has geat location which is conveniently easy to find from the Airport if you mention our hotel name to the taxi transfer/driver.Regarding the Bajajs that line up sometimes in front of hotel area we currently work on it by cooperating with local police to find the solution so those bajajs can park their vehicle on the proper spot area.
That is true that our hotel policy to apply 500.000IDR deposit by cash or creadit card for incidentals guaranteed that will be refunded upon departure. In each room we do provide the safety deposit for the guest as one of our facilities that needs to be requested to open it if you like to use it,and for the compliment of drinking water that has been replenished daily .We are also glad to hear that you did not have any problem with the room temperature and hot water in the room,also you like the taste of our breakfast menu that has live cooking for the omelet. And for the transport requirement for the guest,it’s much easier since we have cooperation with Blue Bird Taxi.
Last but not least, Thank you once again for giving us such a great recommendation for All Seasons Jakarta Gajah Mada. Hopefully your next visit will be as pleasant as the previous one.

Best Regards,
David Kalalo – General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
空港ターミナルからメータータクシーで150,000ルピア弱（高速代込）、モナスや国立博物館などの観光地へは徒歩圏内、レストランやファーストフードや食堂や屋台が多くある極めて便利に立地です。

緑の蔦に覆われたALL SEASONS HOTELの文字の入った塀を潜ると全面ガラスの明るく開放感に溢れたロビーが目に飛び込んできます。

広々としたロビーでは毎朝、無料で新聞（中文、インドネシア語）が読め、更にインターネットができます。

パステルカラーとモノトーンを色調としており、それに調度を合わせた家具からは、旅のウキウキ感と落ち着き感が見事に両立している珍しいデザインです。

イビスより広く清潔な室内には、ダブルベット、机と椅子、カウチ、荷物置き、セーフティボックス、ソニー社の液晶ＴＶ、スリッパ、そしてうれしいことに湯沸かし器、無料の水、珈琲、紅茶（クリーム、砂糖付）もありました。

バスルームはハンドシャワー付き便座とシャワーブース、ドライヤ、ボディーソープ、石鹸、歯ブラシなど必要なものはすべてそろっています。

朝食会場は1階（ＧＦ）で、室内席と屋外席があり、団体さんとぶつかると室内席はほとんど埋まってしまいます。

お食事は、パン、おかゆ、インドネシア風で十分と言えますが、シェフが目の前で卵を焼いてくれるはずですが、いたり、いなかったりして？と思いました。

これで、1泊6,000円弱（税、サービス込）とは、とてもお値打ちと言えます。
title: とってもハイ・コストパフォーマンス

text:
Bodde en natt på detta hotell - ta ett annat! 

Hade bokat för 2 vuxna och två barn. Det tog två timmar att få till en extrasäng på det lilla sterila rummet och vi fick sitta i lobbyn och vänta under tiden. När vi väl kom upp på rummet hade vi mycket riktigt fått en extramadrass som var 3cm tjock !?! Men inget täcke... 

Ner till lobbyn igen och bad om ett täcket... Någon timme senare kom täcket men då utan lakan/påslakan... 

Skippa Jakarta helt faktiskt - en stad med extrema trafikproblem och faktiskt inte mycket att görs som turist mer än att mellanlanda på väg till paradiset ute på de mindre av Gili-öarna...
title: No!

text:
交通は便利で、ガジャマダプラザの裏で立地は良し、ただその分うるさい。交通量の多い道沿いであり車とバイクのクラクションは朝から響き、隣の部屋の音も入ってきます。
一見きれいでもあまり考えられていなくてメンテも行き届いていない部屋。
ランドリーの受け取りを頼んで４０分、強く催促してさらに２０分、洗濯物を出すだけで１時間。
まあ、東南アジア全域こんなものとも言えますが。。。。
清潔ではあるし、安いし、場所だけで選べば満足できると思います。

何故かトイレの電気は消せませんので、気になる人は毛布をかぶって寝ることになります。
LEDの飾り電球のようで、小さな電気なのでたいして明るくはありませんが、物を探すくらいなら困らない程度の明るさがあります。
title: 悪くないけど、、、、やっぱりインドネシアタイム
